text: Noney District is a new district in Manipur, India, created by bifurcating erstwhile Tamenglong District. The district headquarters is located in Longmai. ==Sub-divisions== The following are the sub-divisions in Noney district: * Longmai * Nungba * Khoupum * Haochong ==Demographic== Majority of the residents are ethnic Rongmei Naga with a large Inpui Naga minority in Haochong subdivision. Rongmei language is the most commonly spoken language with few Inpui, Chiru, Gangte and Thado speakers. ==References== Category:Districts of Manipur Category:Minority Concentrated Districts in India
title: Noney district
